thread.title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (February 6) - Edwin Jackson, DACA

title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (February 6) - Edwin Jackson, DACA
text:
The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.
The opinions expressed are his own. Reuters has not edited the statements or confirmed their accuracy.
@realDonaldTrump :
- So disgraceful that a person illegally in our country killed @Colts linebacker Edwin Jackson. This is just one of many such preventable tragedies. We must get the Dems to get tough on the Border, and with illegal immigration, FAST! [0832 EST]
- My prayers and best wishes are with the family of Edwin Jackson, a wonderful young man whose life was so senselessly taken. @Colts [0837 EST]
- Polling shows nearly 7 in 10 Americans support an immigration reform package that includes DACA, fully secures the border, ends chain migration & cancels the visa lottery. If D's oppose this deal, they aren't serious about DACA-they just want open borders. bit.ly/2nNgIVm [1100 EST]
- We need a 21st century MERIT-BASED immigration system. Chain migration and the visa lottery are outdated programs that hurt our economic and national security. bit.ly/2nNMfqh [1105 EST]
- Today, we heard the experiences of law enforcement professionals and community leaders working to combat the threat of MS-13, and the reforms we need from Congress to defeat it. Watch here: bit.ly/2E9Dly0 [1745 EST]
- HAPPY BIRTHDAY to our 40th President of the United States of America, Ronald Reagan! [1948 EST]
-- Source link: ( bit.ly/2jBh4LU ) ( bit.ly/2jpEXYR )
Compiled by Bengaluru bureau
